section.name: Third-party OSGi Bundles
section.p: We list here packages and other projects which have been bundled for OSGi. In most cases we only had to extend the MANIFEST-INF with the OSGi Bundle-MetaInformation like Bundle-Export and Bundle-Import. In some cases we also added an Activator to start the bundle, i.g., Log4j.

tr.td: The Apache Log4J logging mechanism has been integrated with an Acitvator.
